page.title: 15Occupations of Ipplepen
page.content: These are the{occupations}of the {main earning parent}in two classes of this school. Unemployment is nil. Education 8 Office work 1 Medicine 1 Horticulture 1 Law and Order 2 Insurance 1 Retail 5 Leisure Industry 1 BuildingTrade 5 Housewife 2 Engineering 3 Transport 1 Banking 1 Accountancy 1 Craftsman 4 Tradesman 1 Farming 3 Small Businesses 8 { The breakdown of the list working in {this Domesday square is:}Education 1, Building 3, Engineering 1, Craftsman 1 Farming 1, Insurance 1, Housewife 2, Tradesman 1, Small Businesses 5, Accountancy 1. {Remaining parents {travel}to areas of Totnes, Torquay, Ashburton, and Newton Abbot{or work {from home. All parents use private {transport}to their employment.
